00020 //*****************************************************************************
00021 
00022 #include "lpc210x.h"
00023 
00024 #include "global.h"
00025 #include "processor.h"
00026 
00027 void processorInit(void)
00028 {
00029     // set PLL multiplier & divisor.
00030     // values computed from config.h
00031     PLLCFG = PLLCFG_MSEL | PLLCFG_PSEL;
00032 
00033     // enable PLL
00034     PLLCON = PLLCON_PLLE;
00035     PLLFEED = 0xAA;                       // Make it happen.  These two updates
00036     PLLFEED = 0x55;                       // MUST occur in sequence.
00037 
00038     // wait for PLL lock
00039     while (!(PLLSTAT & PLLSTAT_LOCK))
00040         continue;
00041 
00042     // enable & connect PLL
00043     PLLCON = PLLCON_PLLE | PLLCON_PLLC;
00044     PLLFEED = 0xAA;                       // Make it happen.  These two updates
00045     PLLFEED = 0x55;                       // MUST occur in sequence.
00046 
00047     // setup & enable the MAM
00048     MAMTIM = MAMTIM_CYCLES;
00049     MAMCR = MAMCR_FULL;
00050 
00051     // set the peripheral bus speed
00052     // value computed from global.h
00053     VPBDIV = VPBDIV_VALUE;                // set the peripheral bus clock speed
00054 }
00055 
00056 
00057 
00058 
00059 #define IRQ_MASK 0x00000080
00060 #define FIQ_MASK 0x00000040
00061 #define INT_MASK (IRQ_MASK | FIQ_MASK)
00062 
00063 static inline unsigned __get_cpsr(void)
00064 {
00065   unsigned long retval;
00066   asm volatile (" mrs  %0, cpsr" : "=r" (retval) : /* no inputs */  );
00067   return retval;
00068 }
00069 
00070 static inline void __set_cpsr(unsigned val)
00071 {
00072   asm volatile (" msr  cpsr, %0" : /* no outputs */ : "r" (val)  );
00073 }
00074 
00075 unsigned disableIRQ(void)
00076 {
00077   unsigned _cpsr;
00078 
00079   _cpsr = __get_cpsr();
00080   __set_cpsr(_cpsr | IRQ_MASK);
00081   return _cpsr;
00082 }
00083 
00084 unsigned restoreIRQ(unsigned oldCPSR)
00085 {
00086   unsigned _cpsr;
00087 
00088   _cpsr = __get_cpsr();
00089   __set_cpsr((_cpsr & ~IRQ_MASK) | (oldCPSR & IRQ_MASK));
00090   return _cpsr;
00091 }
00092 
00093 unsigned enableIRQ(void)
00094 {
00095   unsigned _cpsr;
00096 
00097   _cpsr = __get_cpsr();
00098   __set_cpsr(_cpsr & ~IRQ_MASK);
00099   return _cpsr;
00100 }
00101 
00102 unsigned disableFIQ(void)
00103 {
00104   unsigned _cpsr;
00105 
00106   _cpsr = __get_cpsr();
00107   __set_cpsr(_cpsr | FIQ_MASK);
00108   return _cpsr;
00109 }
00110 
00111 unsigned restoreFIQ(unsigned oldCPSR)
00112 {
00113   unsigned _cpsr;
00114 
00115   _cpsr = __get_cpsr();
00116   __set_cpsr((_cpsr & ~FIQ_MASK) | (oldCPSR & FIQ_MASK));
00117   return _cpsr;
00118 }
00119 
00120 unsigned enableFIQ(void)
00121 {
00122   unsigned _cpsr;
00123 
00124   _cpsr = __get_cpsr();
00125   __set_cpsr(_cpsr & ~FIQ_MASK);
00126   return _cpsr;
00127 }
